mapper.sql: datetime_one, datetime_two, datetime_three, datetime_four, datetime_five, datetime_six
mapper.insert: insert into datetime_table (datetime_one, datetime_two, datetime_three, datetime_four, datetime_five, datetime_six) values (#{datetimeOne}, #{datetimeTwo}, #{datetimeThree}, #{datetimeFour}, #{datetimeFive}, #{datetimeSix})
mapper.select: select datetime_one, datetime_two, datetime_three, datetime_four, datetime_five, datetime_six from datetime_table where id = #{id}
